graphql.query:
mutation(
    $goal_id : ID
    $title: String
    $description: String
    $media: JSON
    $likes: JSON
) {
  create_japanese_posts(
    input: {
        goal_id:$goal_id
        title:$title
        description:$description
        media:$media
        likes:$likes
    }
  ) {
   id
    user_id
    goal_id
    title
    description
    media
    likes
    created_at
    updated_at
}
}

mutation(
    $id:ID
    $goal_id : ID
    $title: String
    $description: String
    $media: JSON
    $likes: JSON
) {
  update_japanese_posts(
    input: {
        id:$id
        goal_id:$goal_id
        title:$title
        description:$description
        media:$media
        likes:$likes
    }
  ) {
   id
    user_id
    goal_id
    title
    description
    media
    likes
    created_at
    updated_at
}
}

graphql.query:
mutation(
    $id : ID
    $goal_id : ID
    $type: String
    $more : JSON
    $score : Float
    )
{
  update_japanese_goals(
    input: 
    {
     id: $id
     type: $type
    goal_id : $goal_id
    more : $more
    score : $score
    }) {
        id
        goal_id,
        type
        score,
        more

    }
  
}

mutation(
    $name:String, 
    $email:String, 
    $username:String, 
    $quotes: String,
    $phone_number: String ,
    $avatar_attachment_id: ID,
    $background_attachment_id: ID
    ) 
{
  update_user(
    input: 
    {
        name: $name
        email: $email
        username: $username
        quotes: $quotes
        phone_number: $phone_number
        avatar_attachment_id: $avatar_attachment_id
        background_attachment_id : $background_attachment_id
    }) 
    {
            id
            name
            email
            username
            quotes
            phone_number
            created_at
            updated_at
            attachment{
                id
                file
                thumb
            }
            background_attachment{
                id
                file
                thumb
            }
        }
}

mutation(
    $background_file:String, 
    $face:JSON, 
    $hair:JSON, 
    $eyebrows:JSON, 
    $body:JSON, 
    $eyes:JSON, 
    $mouth:JSON, 
    $nose:JSON, 
    $shirt:JSON 
    $trouser:JSON, 
    $shoes:JSON,
    ) 
{
  create_user_avatar(
    input: 
    {
        background_file: $background_file
        face: $face
        hair: $hair
        eyebrows: $eyebrows
        body: $body
        eyes: $eyes
        mouth: $mouth
        nose: $nose
        shirt: $shirt
        trouser: $trouser
        shoes: $shoes
    }) 
    {
        id
        user{
            id
            name
            email
            created_at
            updated_at
        }
        background_file
        face
        hair
        eyebrows
        body
        eyes
        mouth
        nose
        shirt
        trouser
        shoes
    }
}

query {
  user_avatars(first:22, page:1) {
    data {
     id
        user{
            id
            name
            email
            created_at
            updated_at
        }
        background_file
        face
        hair
        eyebrows
        body
        eyes
        mouth
        nose
        shirt
        trouser
        shoes
        created_at
        updated_at
  }
  }
}

query(
    $first: Int!, 
    $page: Int!, 
    $orderBy: [OrderByClause!])
    {
  sort_user_avatars(
      first: $first, 
      page: $page, 
      orderBy: $orderBy
    ) {
    data {
      id
        user{
            id
            name
            email
            created_at
            updated_at
        }
        background_file
        face
        hair
        eyebrows
        body
        eyes
        mouth
        nose
        shirt
        trouser
        shoes
        created_at
        updated_at
  }
    paginatorInfo {
      total
      currentPage
      hasMorePages
      lastPage
    }
  }
}

graphql.query:
mutation(
  $parent_id: ID
  $name: String!
  $attachment_ids:  JSON
  $start_day: DateTime!
  $end_day: DateTime!
  $status : String!
  $task_id: ID
  $is_pined: Boolean
) {
  task_to_goal(
    input: {
      parent_id: $parent_id
      name: $name
      attachment_ids: $attachment_ids
      start_day: $start_day
      end_day: $end_day
      status: $status
      task_id: $task_id
      is_pined: $is_pined
    }
  ) {
    id
    name
    user{
        id
    }
    start_day
    end_day
    status
    task_id
    is_pined
    
  }
}

graphql.query:
query ($task_id: ID!, $checked_at: String) {
        detail_todolist(task_id: $task_id, checked_at: $checked_at) {
          id
          name
          general_info {
            id
            address
            zalo
            repeat
            reminder
            action_at
            action_at_time
            note
            attachments {
              id
              file
              file_type
              thumb
            }
            publish
            contest
            color
          }
          name
          status
          checked_at
          created_at
          updated_at
        }
      }

mutation(
    $id : ID
    $root_id:ID
    $task_id : ID
    $report_type : String
  $parent_id: ID
  $name: String!
  $start_day: DateTime!
  $end_day: DateTime!
  $status : String!
  $locks: JSON
  $is_lock: Boolean
  $is_pined: Boolean
  $general_info: JSON
) {
  upsert_goal(
    input: {
        id : $id
        root_id : $root_id
        task_id : $task_id
        report_type : $report_type
      parent_id: $parent_id
      name: $name
      start_day: $start_day
      end_day: $end_day
      status: $status
      locks: $locks
      is_lock: $is_lock
      is_pined: $is_pined
      general_info: $general_info
    }
  ) 
}

graphql.query:
mutation(
  $id: ID!
  $is_change_all: Boolean
  $parent_id: ID
  $report_type : String
  $name: String
  $start_day: DateTime
  $end_day: DateTime
  $status : String
  $is_pined: Boolean
  $general_info: JSON
) {
  update_goal(
    input: {
      id: $id
      is_change_all: $is_change_all
      parent_id: $parent_id
      report_type : $report_type
      name: $name
      start_day: $start_day
      end_day: $end_day
      status: $status
      is_pined: $is_pined
      general_info: $general_info
    }
  ) {
    id
    name
    start_day
    end_day
    status
    is_pined
    general_info{
        address
        zalo
        repeat
        reminder
        action_at
        note
        publish
        color
        attachments{
            file
            file_type
            thumb
        }
    }
    progress
  }
}
